glsa.title: zlib: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in zlib, the worst of which could allow attackers to cause a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: zlib is a widely used free and patent unencumbered data compression library.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in zlib. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: An attacker could cause a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All zlib users should upgrade to the latest version:
